files.package.json:
{
	"name": "@alloc/quick-lru",
	"version": "5.2.0",
	"description": "Simple “Least Recently Used” (LRU) cache",
	"license": "MIT",
	"repository": "sindresorhus/quick-lru",
	"funding": "https://github.com/sponsors/sindresorhus",
	"author": {
		"name": "Sindre Sorhus",
		"email": "sindresorhus@gmail.com",
		"url": "https://sindresorhus.com"
	},
	"engines": {
		"node": ">=10"
	},
	"scripts": {
		"test": "xo && nyc ava && tsd"
	},
	"files": [
		"index.js",
		"index.d.ts"
	],
	"keywords": [
		"lru",
		"quick",
		"cache",
		"caching",
		"least",
		"recently",
		"used",
		"fast",
		"map",
		"hash",
		"buffer"
	],
	"devDependencies": {
		"ava": "^2.0.0",
		"coveralls": "^3.0.3",
		"nyc": "^15.0.0",
		"tsd": "^0.11.0",
		"xo": "^0.26.0"
	}
}
